name: P❤︎NG
description:
P❤︎NG is a lovely, non-competitive pong interpretation made in 2 hours* for valentine's day.

Description:

Try to keep love between you and your partner to bring both of you closer together. Keeping it to yourself, or trying to score a point will lead you further apart. 

Controls:

This game was designed to be played with one controller, shared between the two players. Controller instructions are available through the menu.

  • W/S and Up Arrow/Down Arrow to move.
  • ENTER to make selections.
  • BACKSPACE button to go back to the menu.
  • F to toggle full-screen (on by default).
  • H for help.
  • ESC to quit the game.

*The original version was made in 2 hours on Feb. 14th, 2018. The screenshots are from the extended version where I swapped the art assets and refined the feel of the game.
